attributes.action: act on these petitions instead of just using them to make fun of the opposition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The PM recently stated that there were "just 15" signatures in a e-petition. That e-petition now has over 15000; http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Election-year/
If he wants to be taken seriously, he should not flout this tool as if it were a joke he will never act on.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
